misuses.description: The code uses a predictable password for the KeyStore, which is easily guessable and can be used to compromise the security of the system.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure password for the KeyStore, and make sure it is not predictable or easily guessable.

misuses.description: The code uses the vulnerable method 'toCharArray()' to derive a key from a password, which can be easily reverse-engineered and compromise the security of the system.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure and well-vetted key derivation function, such as PBKDF2 or Argon2, to derive a key from a password.
